website_summaries.verdict: While the cooling effect is reasonable, the odor is a concern and the shape and firmness level won't work for everyone.
pros: A combination of its gusseted design, ventilated gel-infused memory foam, and cool-pass cover delivers a soothing cooling effect
cons: Owners gripe about its strange smell that has the tendency to linger
Firm – those who like a softer pillow may even say it's hard

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!!!! If this pillow doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer Beware!!!! If this pillow doesn't work for you, you CANNOT return it. Amazon's policy didn't allow a return. I called the manufacturer (Classic Brands......Gail fielded the call) to see if they would do a return. Nope. Once you open it, you own it. The warranty only covers defects. My reason to return the pillow: I have to sleep on my back due to shoulder problems. This pillow (6" depth) tilted my neck too far forward, resulting in repeated bouts of airway obstruction. Two nights of this torture was enough for me (and my wife, who kept getting awakened as I struggled to regain an open airway).
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: DISAPPOINTED!!! NOT a cooling pillow!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased cooling pillows in the past. This pillow DID NOT COOL AT ALL!! And at $40.00 this is absolute nonsense. I'm returning for a refund. I'll go back to purchase my cooling pillows from Sam's Club. The Serta brand they sell is the real deal cooling. I ordered from Amazon because when I wanted the pillow, Sam's wasn't yet selling them (mid winter is not a time when most people need cooling pillow unless you live in a warm climate like me). This pillow is however firm, very thick and could be used for support of that's your thing. ***If you're like me and your head sweats every night, I firmly suggest you do not purchase this pillow****
customer_reviews.author: Bobbi J.

customer_reviews.title: EXTREMELY FIRM
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is very well made, however it is made so good that it doesn't allow any give when resting your head on it so your neck isn't in alignment. We thought the more we slept on them the better it would be but that's not the case, they are tough. I wish I would have returned them instead of toughing it out to see if it would get better. We both have awful neck pain every morning but they were too expensive to just throw out!🙄 I give them 110% for quality, hardiness and material but a 0 for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big and heavy
customer_reviews.text: Pillow is super big! I can’t understand how to put my Head on it at night! Maybe to lay for my back while watching a movie but not to sleep with. Comfort/ it’s nice, but the fact that it’s so big and heavy! And it’s heavy! Don’t let it accidentally fall on your head cuz youll for sure sleep good after that concussion
customer_reviews.author: Raul rosales

customer_reviews.title: Good pillow | Inconsistent quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall good pillow for the price. I ordered 2 king size pillows and I have to say that based on what I received that quality is not consistent. One pillow is noticeably taller than the other. As a result one is more firm than the other. Which worked out well for my situation as my spouse prefers one over the other and vice versa. Shipping was long - around 14 days, but to be expected I guess given the current business climate.
customer_reviews.author: MarHar

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: So far i love this pillow. I am a large guy and have a hard time finding pillows that i can manhandle and still hold shape. This pillow sleeps cool which is great. The pillow is very big tho so keep that in mind. It is easy to share with the wife being that it is the length of 2 of our old pillows. The lettering wore off after a few uses but it actually makes it look better in my opinion. I am a back and side sleeper and it works for both. Its also a great pillow to cuddle if your ever feeling the need.
customer_reviews.author: Remmick

customer_reviews.title: No more neck pain
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband, but was too soft for him. (We affectionately call his pillow "the brick.") Almost returned it, but decided to give it a try myself. Results were dramatic. I used to wake up nearly every morning--after sleeping on a shredded memory foam pillow--with pain and tightness on both sides of the back of my neck. After the very first night on this pillow: no pain next morning, or on any mornings thereafter. Grateful!
customer_reviews.author: CLF

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this pillow! I'm a side sleeper so finding a good memory foam pillow that appropriately fills the space between the mattress and my head was important. The gusseted side does the trick and the pillow is large enough that it fills the pillowcase without shifting around. When I first tried it I thought it might be too soft after sleeping for years on a pillow that my father refers to as "the brick" but it took only a few minutes to get comfortable with it. Yes, it had a chemical smell when first opened but the smell was gone by the next day.
customer_reviews.author: saptbg

customer_reviews.title: This super flimsy, extremely flattening pillow SUCKS!!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow SUCKS!!! I ordered the king sized and this is actually my second one from this company. The first one was awesome; firm, thick, slept well, and held its shape well. This last pillow I ordered is only about 4 inches thick (compared to 6 inches before) and it flattens more than any memory foam pillow I have ever owned. It's not firm at all. We cant even use it because it is so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA VICK

customer_reviews.title: ... lower shoulder pains and this pillow helped me sleep better. Whether its sleeping in my back or side
customer_reviews.text: I had alot of lower shoulder pains and this pillow helped me sleep better. Whether its sleeping in my back or side. There a slight smell that will eventually go away. Does exactly what it says and i was told that my shoulders didn't feel as tight as before. Totally recommend if you do carry heavy textbooks as a student and if you type alot. These were the main factors that caused my shoulders to hurt. It about 5.5 inches high, just right !
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Neck pain resolved!!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a side/back sleeper and all my regular pillows would end up misshapen, deformed and flat where I needed support the most. I purchased this pillow because I was having regular neck pain. This pillow is super comfortable and has resolved my neck pain!! I liked it so much that my husband tried it and ordered one as well. - It does lose a little firmness over time, but it was very firm at initial use. - It really doesn’t keep cool, but I didn’t actually expect it to. - It didn’t have a scent. - Amazing value compared to others like it.
customer_reviews.author: NCOLE

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow has changed my life. I am at a certain age when I seem always to be hot. I'm a side sleeper that likes to sleep a bit more elevated than one normal pillow could provide, but two pillows always put a "crick" in my neck. This pillow is, like Goldilocks would say, "just right." Not too soft, not too hard. I sleep like a baby all night long.
customer_reviews.author: E. Malliris

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow for people that sleep on their sides
customer_reviews.text: This is a great pillow for people that sleep on their sides. I try to sleep on my back and it was a little too big for that. That when I want to sleep on my sides it's incredibly comfortable in a great pillow for me. I have neck problems I have a long neck and broad shoulders so sleeping on my side usually hurt but with this pillow it supports my neck and shoulders really well. So if you are a side sleeper I would suggest this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because Im tired of traditional pillows that always go flat. It advertises a 4.5 inch loft but its more like 3.75 to 4 inches. It definately keeps me from waking up with neck pain that triggers migraines and is perfect for my 12" memory foam mattress. Quality and durability is 5 stars but I can only rate 4 stars because the loft was overstated by almost an inch in the description.
customer_reviews.author: T. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good pillow
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened it there was a faint smell, but I've noticed that with every memory foam pillow I've ever purchased. The pillow feels comparable to a medium density standard pillow. The air channels in the pillow cause an awkward suction feeling in my ear (I'm typically a side sleeper) and I don't care for that, but I have found that I am able to sleep comfortably on my back with this one. Its definitely a nice, king size pillow and I'd probably purchase it again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: LaHa

customer_reviews.title: 4 1/2 inches thick, not the 6 inches as described. "This item isn't eligible for return."
customer_reviews.text: This pillow measures 4 1/2" at its thickest point, not the 6" as stated in the description. The real problem is that I received it today, opened it, discovered it was not as described but when I went to return it I found out that "This item isn't eligible for return." I had to contact Amazon to inquire about this and luckily they were kind enough to resolve the issue for me. Maybe I received a defective item but returning it because of that shouldn't be a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Not the awesome one I had before
customer_reviews.text: I had the non cooling for 3 years and absolutely loved it. Finally decided it was time to replace and was excited to find them still available and now with a cooling version as well. Ordered it up, and was so sad when I got it. It's nowhere near as thick and firm as the original. Pretty bummed. Of you like a normal thickness and support you may still like this. But as a big guy, who liked the original super thick and firm version I will be finding something different now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Lester

customer_reviews.title: definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.text: i love it! i was thinking of buying the contour pillow but there are no king sizes...and when i found this, i ordered it immediately...and i have got no regrets, it is king size indeed! and when i slept on it, i just don't wanna get out of it! thanks! this is definitely a winner!
customer_reviews.author: JANI

customer_reviews.title: Just not for me I guess
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this pillow. But for me, it was way too stiff. I had to constantly adjust my position and could not stay asleep for more than 30 mins at a time. I thought this would be great since I'm a side sleeper, but my bed is really soft and this pillow was too stiff, causing my neck to be strained.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Reyes

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was great at first, but after a few weeks I woke up with a back/neck ache every morning. I think the pillow itself is too firm, doesn't have enough give. I ended up purchasing a $40 pillow at bed bath and beyond that is working much better.
customer_reviews.author: Tay Tap

customer_reviews.title: Stained cover, really??
customer_reviews.text: I'm returning this because I received it with a stained cover. Who ships out "brand new" products that look used? Definitely not putting my head on this. And it does smell, but I'm sure it would go away with time but the stain did it for me. You can have this back
customer_reviews.author: Uhhmaahzing

customer_reviews.title: Pillow sucks
customer_reviews.text: After 1 night of sleep,this pillow sucks. Worst sleep ever. And just found out it can't be returned. This will affect my future purchases with Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Knight

customer_reviews.title: was a bit skeptical BUT love the pillow
customer_reviews.text: was a bit skeptical BUT love the pillow. I sleep comfortably on back or side with good support. Cool ventilated feature does work. If too hot just just move pillow or flip and get cool again. best product I have found
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy for side sleep
customer_reviews.text: We are side sleepers are really love these pillows. We have had them a couple of weeks and I don’t have any neck pain like I do with a normal pillow. Do open them up and let them air out first before using. The cooling feeling lasts long enough for me to fall asleep.
customer_reviews.author: thepoorchild

customer_reviews.title: so I guess that's a good thing - no more stolen pillows in the middle ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit more firm than I expected, but it absolutely keeps the heat at bay during the night. If you have a light head (I don't) it might be too stiff to really depress much when laying on it. My wife hates it, so I guess that's a good thing - no more stolen pillows in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: Waco

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but a little too firm for me
customer_reviews.text: I have a memory foam pillow that I love but it only comes in a standard size, so I bought this one in king size. It's a good quality pillow but for me it's too thick and there's not quite enough "give" for my head and spine to be in alignment, resulting in neck discomfort. I'm sending it back, but if you like a firmer pillow definitely give this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Carolan Ivey

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch pillow
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pillow. Very soft and cool. The foam feels more like a good sponge rather than that cheap, egg-crate mattress topper foam. The zippered pillow case, on the other hand, feels very polyester-like... similar to those "quick-wick" or "tech" shirts. But I don't really feel it laying on my back. The pillow IS returnable.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Not for a side sleeper
customer_reviews.text: The pillow is extra soft. Didn't find myself sweating as much. However it is too square for me. Kinda puts my neck in a crampy position. I would say it's perfect for someone who sleeps on their back. I'm a side sleeper and I like to cradle my pillow. Couldn't really do that with this. Have this pillow to my mom who unfortunately has been in 3 car accidents in a years time frame and she loves it!!! Great for back and neck. Overall if you sleep on your back I'd give it a perfect 10. If you are a side sleeper like myself don't do it
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: arrived in perfect condition. Love the cool feeling but haven't had ...
customer_reviews.text: Speedy, reliable shipping, arrived in perfect condition. Love the cool feeling but haven't had long enough to comment on whether it helps my neck issues. Still, it's a very good quality pillow and I will keep it, if not for myself, for another family member. This pillow is a winner. So cool, comfortable and really helps with my neck pain. This is a keeper and I will be ordering more. At last relief from neck pain, a real pain in the neck (pardon the pun). You will love it too.
customer_reviews.author: roann

customer_reviews.title: Nice Design - Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: I like the pillow design and firmness. But I have not been able to sleep on the pillow yet because of the horrendous smell. It's truly awful. I've been letting it air out hoping the smell will dissipate, but so far it has not. I'll wait another week and hope the smell will go away, but if not ... the pillow will have to go back.
customer_reviews.author: ND Irish Fan

customer_reviews.title: Too firm
customer_reviews.text: It was only comfortable for a short time. Too high for my husband and me.
customer_reviews.author: Minh

customer_reviews.title: Hard as a Rock
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind a firm pillow but this one is like concrete. Very heavy, too. Also, even after airing it out for two weeks, the fumes are enough to give you a headache. Hard to imagine who this pillow is designed for. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C. Lent

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a cooling pillow and to start it is not cool but it props my head in such an awkward ...
customer_reviews.text: The most uncomfortable pillow I have ever used. I was looking for a cooling pillow and to start it is not cool but it props my head in such an awkward position I have a sore neck for hours after I wake up.
customer_reviews.author: P Patino

customer_reviews.title: too thick for a back sleeper
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was too thick to be a back sleeper pillow, which caused neck and shoulder pain in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Racingfan

customer_reviews.title: Good neck support for side sleepers
customer_reviews.text: I have never owned a gel pillow before but so far I like this one as it keeps its shape and gives good neck support as I am sleep on my side. The other reason I like it so much is because the pillow it replaced had so flattened out that I had no neck support at all, even after plumping it over-and-over throughout the night. (I actually had to go to an acupuncturist to get all the neck kinks out caused by my old pillow). Maybe I wouldn't like this pillow so much if my previous one hadn't been so awful. I'm not sure. All I know is that so far I am happy. I would recommend this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Medium firm
customer_reviews.text: I tried A LOT of pillows before I ended up very happy with this one. I tried many that were too soft or 'plush' and many which were too firm. Tried a lot labeled as plush which were firm, and a lot which were labeled as firm but were not firm at all. This pillow is very much medium-firm, which was what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Too firm for me.  Did not cool my Mellon.
customer_reviews.text: Buying a “comfortable” pillow is a very personal decision and like the story of Goldielocks and the three bears. One is too small, one too large, one too soft and one is too hard... For me this did not work. It was too hard and did not cool. That’s about all I can say about it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Junco

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Since I've been using this pillow, I have no longer had any acid reflux issues, and I am sleeping better. The only negative is that the cats now want to sleep on my face. :( They are constantly stealing these pillows from the husband and me, so we have to do the laundry more often. (Seriously.)
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Sleeping throughout the night!
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with this pillow. I've been dealing with neck pain and I think my old pillow was the culprit. After switching to this one, my neck pain has dropped off. And the cooling properties are awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Grande

customer_reviews.title: Ridiculously firm
customer_reviews.text: I typically prefer firm pillows, but this one was like sleeping on a rock. The quality seemed nice, but the foam is so firm that I couldn't sleep comfortably. Even my husband (who LOVES firm pillows more than I do) mentioned that the pillow felt hard. Definitely wouldn't recommend this, unless you really love ultra firm support.
customer_reviews.author: megz

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not as firm as I thought it would be not cooling at all.
customer_reviews.author: Nicky b

customer_reviews.title: I've been looking for a great side sleeper pillow
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a great side sleeper pillow and this is it! I have not slept better in years! It is tall enough that I don't need multiple pillow like I did before and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Megan D.

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Head still dips when I try to sleep on my side. The main reason this pillow was bought was to correct that. If you have sore neck issues and are hoping for this pillow to somehow keep your melon shoulder level as you sleep, look elsewhere. This is not the pillow you are looking for (waving my hand)....
customer_reviews.author: Luistech

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pillow to replace a sculptured memory foam pillow. With the old pillow I couldn't reliably get my head situated.This one, being flat does not cause that problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not cooling. Way to firm (for me)
customer_reviews.text: Way to firm for me. If you like firm, you will probably love it. Also, there’s nothing cooking about it. It actually made me hot trying to sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tara J.

customer_reviews.title: This pillow holds its shape very well.
customer_reviews.text: I love it's soft/firm feel, that it is a bit cooler than a regular pillow, and it's shape. This pillow is so good it's all I need now - I used to need two pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E. Meyertons

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable pillow
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable pillow. Maybe a little on the soft side so it you want something more firm keep looking. New pillow smell early on but it goes away.
customer_reviews.author: brandieg

customer_reviews.title: Nice pillow—enormous.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this pillow for about 3 weeks, and I really love it. It is enormous, and it barely fits into the king-sized pillow case. However, I love the thick memory foam feel of it, and it sleeps great!
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: Not the Samr as Prior
customer_reviews.text: Purchase the same pillow a year ago and the newest one is slimmer and does not provide as much support as the previous. Wake up daily with headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Deniz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pillow
customer_reviews.text: Tried others and they were too soft. This has enough firmness to support but it forms right to your neck and head with the heat of your body.
customer_reviews.author: Happy shopper

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly non-floofy
customer_reviews.text: I hate huge fluffy pillows. This is nice and flat, very firm. Ventilation holes go all the way through, occasionally feels weird when air blows through into your ear as you're laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beware this item is NON-RETURNABLE ! Amazon support or Manufacturer will not do anything !
customer_reviews.text: The pillow I recived was very poor quality. And when I tried to return it , its found that this item can not be returnable. I tried to contact Amazon support, but all they could tell me is to contact the manufacturer thats it. Amazon support was not helpful to resolve the issue. Also manufacturer also didnt reply me anything. So PLEASE DONT BUY THIS PRODUCT ever. The product description is misleading.
customer_reviews.author: SH

customer_reviews.title: Too tall for comfortable back sleeping
customer_reviews.text: Too tall for comfortable back sleeping. You have to have a heavy head to even make a dent in this rock. I thought I would get used to it but I have not and its over-priced compared the the exact same pillow I am now seeing popping up in my Amazon suggestions.
customer_reviews.author: Kara Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: I'm a pillow snob and this is perfect! I could do without the stickers on the case and the hard piping around the edges, though.
customer_reviews.author: J. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, dead-weight, what cooling?
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is very heavy. My poor head felt like it was sleeping on a brick. I really couldn’t fell the cooling gel as the night went on and I tossed and turned all night. I feel like I really tried to give this pillow a chance but in the end it was dead weight and the most uncomfortable night of sleep ever.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: I love this pillow! I’ve tried different pillows and this is by far the best. It holds you so well when you are sleeping, it doesn’t lose shape. Most memory foam pillows absorb so much heat, where as this pillow does give you that cool feeling you want.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good firm pillow
customer_reviews.text: Really like the support of this pillow. I've been using it for a couple months and the pillow has no sag in the middle where I put my head every night. The downside is that it could be a little less firm, and sometimes it seems like it is putting too much resistance on my head. My husband could not use the pillow because of this, he tried it for one night and didn't like how he felt it pushed up on his head too much.
customer_reviews.author: sparkygirl

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pillow- I don't know how we ever slept on feathered or foam pillows growing up. This pillow is cool, supportive, and just the right height. I had zero smell.
customer_reviews.author: BigAnt

customer_reviews.title: not only do I suffer from hot flashes and night sweats but I have had neck surgery and its a constant battle with pain and trying to find a pillow that will help me stay comfortable and not wake up in a great deal of ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been searching for a pillow for a long time, not only do I suffer from hot flashes and night sweats but I have had neck surgery and its a constant battle with pain and trying to find a pillow that will help me stay comfortable and not wake up in a great deal of pain in the mornings. this pillow fits that bill for me, the difference was amazing! I got it yesterday and so this is my first morning waking up without my neck and shoulders hurting and I actually slept!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with it. I was previously sleeping on a pillow that was really really flat and I was having neck pains. This pillow has really helped align my spine and head when I sleep plus it does stay cool. It is surprisingly a heavy pillow and very firm. Shipped quickly and has really helped my sleeping quality.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Jones

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing. Truly
customer_reviews.text: HOLY GHOST, BATMAN!!!!!! Ok, ok, ok,........so,...these just arrived on my doorstep and I could not be more excited. They are amazing. Truly. Do yourself the favor and buy one, shoot,...buy two, but whatever you do, do not buy them from a retailer. A retailer will charge you $125 to $200, no joke. Again, amazing pillow. Also, they arrived from the shipper on time and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm pillow.
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this 5 stars. But it’s shaped like a box. The king size is great, nice and big. It’s firm but still soft.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pillow. It does stay cool and it keeps ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome pillow. It does stay cool and it keeps it's shape. It fits in a standard pillow case but with room. I wish it were a little bigger because of this.
customer_reviews.author: James Don

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pillow, Not really cooler than my old one though.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's particularly cooling but it is a very comfortable pillow, especially for side sleeping. It's has a little too much loft for sleeping on my back and I am disappointed that the cooling aspect doesn't seem noticeable to me, so dropped a star. But if what you want is a comfy, supportive pillow, you can't go wrong here. A standard pillowcase is a little snug on this pillow, but I got it on eventually.
customer_reviews.author: N. Brunk

customer_reviews.title: Good for sleeping on your side
customer_reviews.text: Good for sleeping on your side. Don't know if it's my poor sleeping habits or this pillow, but I get a little neck ache when sleeping on my back with this pillow. The pillow is compressible with a little weight, but unless you have a heavy head, it will probably stay elevate the full height of the pillow. No issues with the product itself.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: We love these pillows!
customer_reviews.text: We have had these pillows for a week and we really like them. They are very good for side sleeping, they hold their shape and keep your head from sliding down. Gotta warn you, the king size weigh 7.5 lbs each so if you have problems lifting these could be an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: PamK

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: The foam feels nice and all, but when you're actually laying your head on it, it basically gets squished flat to the point that there's maybe an inch between your head and the mattress. I can't use this without another pillow. I also don't feel like it is much cooler than any regular pillow or that it stays cooler for any significant amount of time longer.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: Did a lot of research ahead of time, but this was hard for me to get used to. I use it as a guest pillow now. I'm mostly a back sleeper, but do rotate to sides and sometimes stomach. I tried this for nearly a week and it just didn't seem good for me. Now use it as a guest pillow and a few people have appreciated having it as a nice option when they have stayed over with us.
customer_reviews.author: Eddy

customer_reviews.title: I may buy another one:)
customer_reviews.text: I like it...and for the price...you can't go wrong! It's not exactly "cold", but it IS cooler than my other pillows and its very firm, which I like. I wish it were even more cool, but the "brand" name ones are at least twice the price...soooo?
customer_reviews.author: Michele V.

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow!
customer_reviews.text: I love this king size memory foam pillow. It's soft and supportive and I prefer firm pillows. However, this is better for my neck.
customer_reviews.author: ange8094

customer_reviews.title: *UPDATE*Best pillow I’ve ever had!
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE* I ordered another one& the quality has TANKED.. not firm at all!! As soon as I lay my head down it sinks to the bottom as if I was just laying my head on the bed. Super bummed! Love how it keeps its shape! It forms to me when laying on it but when I get up, it goes back to its original shape. Great quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: THE perfect pillow for a good night's rest!
customer_reviews.text: THE perfect pillow for a good night's rest! My previous "cooling" pillow was left on vacation and I needed to replace it. I decided to give this one a try after the reviews. WOW! For someone who is experiencing hot flashes through the night and works long hours in front of a computer, this pillow has really helped! I have ordered a second one for my husband!
customer_reviews.author: JNew

customer_reviews.title: Not for stomach sleepers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband because he was not sleeping well. At first, the pillow seems stiff but he said the first night he laid on it, he sank into it and never moved. He loves this pillow. Works well for side sleepers and back sleepers but definitely not stomach sleepers.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this wonderful product. Best nights sleep in a long time.No neck pain or back pain - Hurray.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy May

customer_reviews.title: Measure Pillow Cases before deciding on a size
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the queen size pillow when should have purchased the standard because the pillow is a bit large for my queen size sheets. The pillow is comfortable and my neck aches from sleeping at night have disappeared. I use the pillow to sleep on my side and back. Be advised, the pillow CANNOT be returned. I would buy the pillow again. .
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: this is an awesome pillow. the strange holes really help and make ...
customer_reviews.text: this is an awesome pillow. the strange holes really help and make it rather cool at night. it's not as firm as some other memory foam pillows. and it's huge in king size - so, make sure you are looking for a large and relatively firm pillow, you'll definitely get what you want on this one. it does smell out of the box, like any memory foam - prepare to "vent" it for 7 days - "vent" as in leave standing within some air flow (in the way of A/C or fan)
customer_reviews.author: blogger

customer_reviews.title: Great but large for a queen bed
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint is that the pillow is large for a queen. The width is at least half the width of a queen bed. But it holds its shape and I now wake up with NO neck pain. I’m a back or side sleeper and it’s great for either.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Hard and feels like sleeping on a brick
customer_reviews.text: Hard and feels like sleeping on a brick! Not cool whatsoever, it makes you warm. complete waiste of money. My neck and shoulders hurts! I wish I could return but I just started using it after we moved to new house and return window is closed!
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this pillow
customer_reviews.text: Update....2 years later and still love it! I use to replace my pillow every month. ...... I absolutely love this pillow!!!!!! Definitely the most comfortable pillow I have ever used. It is a little firm at first but breaks in quick.
customer_reviews.author: Tams

customer_reviews.title: I'd still recommend these
customer_reviews.text: These pillows are very comfortable once you find the right position to lay in! However, between the rather strong odor that they come with (try Febreeze-ing them; it won't entirely get rid of the smell, but it'll help a LOT) that I can occasionally smell still and that they can be a bit too thick for laying on your back (but they're juuuuust right for laying on your side) and I thought I'd knock them a star. Well, that and I personally feel they get a bit warm, but I'm Mr. Toasty so that may not be a problem for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: The cool gel feature is an added bonus
customer_reviews.text: This pillow is magical. I am a side sleeper and have issues with pain in my neck and shoulders. I noticed a big difference right away. I no longer have neck and shoulder pain! The pillow gives a combination of being soft yet firm and supportive. The cool gel feature is an added bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking For Other Choices
customer_reviews.text: It's like sleeping on a concrete slab, tried it for three nights and I can say that was three nights to many. Sent it back, lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: JIM E. JONES

customer_reviews.title: wonderful
customer_reviews.text: this pillow is wonderful. its really firm but still has give. my hunny stole it and wont give it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney M Coomes

customer_reviews.title: Do not order this product. Received it, opened ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not order this product. Received it, opened the package and the pillows smelled musty, mildew odor. So much I could not even sleep on them. Now I find that they cant be returned. Dont waste your money. Now I found out they cant be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick W Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the neck
customer_reviews.text: This pillow made my neck hurt sleeping on it. I gave it to a friend who said it made their neck hurt as well. Currently a third person is using it and likes it, that's why I gave it a second star. I have neck issues anyway but this just exacerbated my problem. I bought a different type that I love. Good luck. Hope you have better sleep than I did with this pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Tom W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Pillow was as described. I bought 2 at a time. One for me and my husband. We were both very satisfied. They are very comfortable and definitely gives you a good night's sleep
customer_reviews.author: Kay H.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but takes time getting used to it.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this pillow in the past and purchased this one for a family member who seems to be enjoying but said it's taking time to get used to it compared to a normal pillow. Good quality pillow, will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: BuzzMcqueen

customer_reviews.title: I like the size of it but I just wish the ...
customer_reviews.text: So far this item is working. It is firm upon arrival but is softening some each night. I like the size of it but I just wish the foam was a bit softer. I am on the fence if I would order again. I will update after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Blanton H.

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: Smelled horrible. I tried to air it out but nothing helped. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: Not as good as the first pillow.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pillow I’ve purchased. I loved the first but this pillow is not as firm as the first. It’s not comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Laurich

customer_reviews.title: No cooler than other memory foam pillows I have owned ...
customer_reviews.text: No cooler than other memory foam pillows I have owned. The density is heavy and the pillow does not feel as soft or supportive to me. Will not purchase a second one. Wish I had passed on the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Fay_way

customer_reviews.title: Pain in the neck
customer_reviews.text: You can feel the seam when sleeping. It is difficult to sleep on your back and hurts your neck because of the pillow thickness.
customer_reviews.author: Content Writer

customer_reviews.title: Great pillow
customer_reviews.text: Takes a while to get used to but really like it now. Im normally a back sleeper and occasionally a side sleeper. Is definitely most comfortable for side sleeping but good for back sleeping also. Very supportive. Only don't love that queen pillow cases aren't a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: Cyleen

customer_reviews.title: Very thick!
customer_reviews.text: This pillow was to thick and firm. It seems as though each side is a different firmness, but even the plush is too thick, and causes cricks in the neck, shoulders and back. They do however make a wonderful dog bed.
customer_reviews.author: Shoppingaddiction

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: Its hard for me to find a pillow I can sleep with. I have a bad back and neck so I’m constantly readjusting my pillows at night. I found this pillow and I love it! I thought I ordered a standard pillow but they deff sent a king size
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: The pillow is very nicely made
customer_reviews.text: It is very well made and seems like it will be durable. It makes a nice back rest... not a stunningly comfortable head pillow as some have described. If you are use to a filled pillow... it will not be like that. It has resistance and springs back. Can't honestly say I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: bluefish

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me cool, keeps its shape.
customer_reviews.text: Best pillow I've ever had. Keeps me cool, keeps its shape. Can even turn it around four ways for extra cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Typo

customer_reviews.title: not as good as I had hoped
customer_reviews.text: Ok, it's firm I will give this pillow that. It supports your neck but I wasn't sleeping in comfort because of this pillow. I had neck pain and also woke up with back pain which has not happened before...sorry but this one isn't for me.
customer_reviews.author: ronnie angel

customer_reviews.title: Older model much better
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model of this pillow and loved it, its perfectly firm and cradles you just right, so I obviously needed to update and ordered this new garbage, unfortunate that the pillow has such a downgraded quality the foam is entirely different then my first one dont understand at all
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Kasper

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Im in love with this pillow!!!!!!! It's so comfy! I love it so much i ordered myself another and 1 for my son! Also no annoying smells. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Schoonmaker

product_meta.title: Classic Brands Cool Sleep Ventilated Gel Memory Foam Gusseted Pillow with Performance Cool Pass Cover, King
product_meta.description:
Size:King

Classic Brands Cool Sleep Ventilated Gel Memory Foam Gusseted Pillow is made of a unique material that infuses gel particles into memory foam, creating a plusher and more comfortable sleeping surface. The memory is responsive and cradles your head and provides support for your neck and shoulders. Cool sleep gel combined with a Cool-pass performance knit cover is specifically designed to regulate temperature and wick away moisture for a more comfortable night's sleep. 

 The Cool Sleep pillow features ventilated Gel Memory foam, which is a unique material that infuses gel particles into memory foam, creating a plusher and cooler sleeping material. In addition, the Cool Sleep Gel Foam Pillow responds to temperature and pressure to mold to your shape by creating the perfect support for your head, neck and shoulders. Gel memory foam is more porous or open than conventional foam meaning the cells are interconnected unlike closed cell foam; thereby is more breathable and comfortable than higher density visco-elastic foam. 


 Benefits of Cool Gel 
Cool Gel keeps you cool while you sleep - the Cool Gel side disperses body heat and creates a cooler sleeping surface while working with the core of pressure-relieving memory foam. Its cooling properties dissipate heat for a comfortable night’s sleep. The Memory Foam side responds to temperature and pressure to mold to your shape by creating the perfect support for your head, neck and shoulders. 


 Latest Open-Cell Memory Foam Technology 
Open Cell Memory Foam promotes airflow through the pillow - this next generation of memory foam is more porous or open than conventional foam meaning the cells are interconnected unlike closed cell foam; thereby is more breathable and comfortable than higher density visco-elastic foam. The open-celled physical structure of our foams is self-ventilating. Air travels throughout the material and actually dissipate body heat regulating your body temperature. Memory foam is naturally antimicrobial and resistant to allergens, mold, bacteria and dust mites. 


The Right Pillow Matters 
Choosing the right pillow is important. About 20% of your sleep surface is comprised of your pillow. You may not be sure of the right pillow, but you will definitely know when you have the wrong one. It is important to have a pillow which can contour to accommodate the natural curves of the neck to maintain the proper neck posture while sleeping. Whether you sleep on your side or back, your pillow must be soft enough to mold to your head and still fill in the space between your bed and your neck. You need to support both, since your head is larger than your neck and our gel memory foam pillow is great for this. This pillow will support the head at the proper height whether you are sleeping on your back or on your side, keep your head tilted in the proper position while sleeping on your back and provide neck and upper back support when sleeping on your back. 


 Easy Cleaning 
This pillow comes with a removable zip-off machine washable cover.


Quality Assurance 
Classic Brands Cool Sleep Ventilated Gel Memory Foam Gusseted Pillow is backed with a 5-year worry-free warranty. 


Look for more innovative specialty sleep products from Classic Brands
feature_bullets: Gusseted pillow has a 4.5-inch loft-not too tall and not too short, perfect for side and back sleepers
Cool gel-infused memory foam is responsive, creating perfect support for your head, neck, and shoulders
Cool-pass performance knit cover is specifically designed to disperse body heat and wick away moisture for a more comfortable night's sleep
Naturally hygienic and hypoallergenic, resistant to dust mites, mold, and bacteria, not only perfect for allergy sufferers but for those who care about their sleep surface
Super soft removable cover is machine washable and can be used with or without pillowcases
5 Star Customer Service; Available 7 days a week
